references.paper_title: RELION: implementation of a Bayesian approach to cryo-em structure determination
references.reason: This paper introduced RELION, a widely used Bayesian approach for cryo-EM structure determination that has significantly advanced the field.

references.paper_title: cryosparc: algorithms for rapid unsupervised cryo-em structure determination
references.reason: This paper introduced cryoSPARC, another widely used software suite for cryo-EM data processing that has enabled significant improvements in efficiency and accessibility.

references.paper_title: CryoDRGN: reconstruction of heterogeneous cryo-EM structures using neural networks
references.reason: This paper introduced CryoDRGN, a pioneering neural-network-based method for cryo-EM reconstruction that handles heterogeneity in macromolecular structures.

references.paper_title: Amoritized inference for heterogeneous reconstruction in cryo-EM
references.reason: This paper introduced an amortized inference approach for heterogeneous cryo-EM reconstruction, improving efficiency and scalability.

references.paper_title: 3DFlex: determining structure and motion of flexible proteins from cryo-EM
references.reason: This paper introduced 3DFlex, a method that leverages neural fields to model continuous conformational heterogeneity in cryo-EM data, improving the accuracy of structural and dynamic information.
